column2: I could see that it was a very popular restaurant in the Houston area; the ambiance was great
column3: and the place was bustling. We were sat by the sushi bar
column4: and started ordering left and right. Let me just say that the service at this place deserved a 5 stars on its own; everyone was friendly and helpful
column6: even brought out the dishes in intervals (which was a very nice pace
column7: but not for a hungry stomach).
